comprehensive_overview: BLAST+ (Basic Local Alignment Search Tool) is a suite of command-line tools for nucleotide and protein sequence similarity searches. It is widely used for comparing query sequences against a database of sequences to identify homologous sequences and infer functional and evolutionary relationships.
core_features: Nucleotide and protein sequence similarity searches
Command-line interface for flexible and customized searches
Various search algorithms including BLASTN, BLASTP, BLASTX, and others
Statistical significance evaluation of search results
